column4: another question. i've uninstalled brasero but the update manager keeps asking me if i want to update it. is it possible that the program is not entirely  removed?
use synaptic to search and see if a brasero dependency is left on there
u are right. there were some leftovers. i thought the ubuntu software manager removed it completely
in the future, you can use computer-janitor-gtk to check for leftover dependencies
